name: SpaceCiv
description:
A game in space where you build to survive waves of monsters.

A game where you colonize space cities over a few thousand years.

I feel I got a bit off theme as the time slipped away.

Controls are weird.

Space changes between freefly to locked with cursor control.

1 builds a turret

2 Builds a Ship Spawner

3 Builds Housing

4 Builds Shield Re generators

Left click moves the ships
